user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org) with guidance on handling anxiety disorders, and remind him to check his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Guidance on Anxiety Disorders

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Dr. Emily Harris asked me to reach out and kindly request your guidance on handling anxiety disorders. When you have a moment, could you please reply to her at emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org?

Also, she mentioned there’s related material in your Notion workspace—please check that as well.

Thank you so much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
